title: The Lizard Queen does Hardball
author: VD
content_html: Okay, this SNL skit was pretty good last night, although I can’t believe they missed the opportunity to have her talking about B. Hussein Osama’s schooling in the madrassa. Or to have her eat a kitten.
content_text:
Okay,
this SNL skit
was pretty good last night, although I can’t believe they missed the opportunity to have her talking about B. Hussein Osama’s schooling in the madrassa.  Or to have her eat a kitten.
